title: The Mole Who Knew Too Much
description: A suspenseful thriller about a mole who accidentally overhears a plot to flatten the earth.

title: Attack of the 50-Foot Gopher
description: A heartwarming tale of a giant gopher looking for love in all the wrong burrows.

title: Diggers: The Musical
description: Sing along as our cast dances with shovels and serenades earthworms.

title: The Good, The Bad, and The Muddy
description: A Western set entirely in quicksand. Will our hero sink or swim?

title: Tallinn & Torsk
excerpt: Vi åker till Tallinn och förlustar oss.
description: Vi åker till Tallin för att träffa en blivande fru. Vägen kantas av möten med otroliga människor. Produktions år: 2002 Kategori: Mokumentär Finns på dessa DVDs: Brunfilm Classics Vol1 Priser:Krangparty 8 (2002) Wildcompo
